effect_entries.effect:
While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects.

This ability functions identically to air lock.
effect_entries.short_effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

effect_entries.effect: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
effect_entries.short_effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

effect_entries.effect: Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move that causes its HP to drop below 50%, its Special Attack rises by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.
